title: Shortcut delete and menu delete act differently in table column
description:
Description: When trying to delete using the shortcut key and the menu option, different actions are performed in the table column.
Steps to reproduce:
1. [Please provide the specific steps to reproduce the issue]
OB: When trying to delete using the shortcut key and the menu option, different actions are performed in the table column.
EB: The shortcut key and the menu option should perform the same action when deleting in the table column.
SR: Ensure that the delete action behaves consistently whether using the shortcut key or the menu option in the table column.
